      • totalCostOfComponents

        public int totalCostOfComponents(java.lang.String component_type)
                          throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Returns the total cost for all components that is from the same type in the store
        Parameters:
        String - component_type [the component that method will return total cost for all components under this type
        Returns:
        total price for specefic component type
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case that the string parameter not match with one of the components classes(HardDisk,Display,Processor)
